scripts.build-win: pkg -o built/convertmp4 -t node18-win-x64 convertmp4.js && pkg -o built/compress -t node18-win-x64 compress.js
scripts.build-mac: pkg -o built/convertmp4 -t node18-macos-x64 convertmp4.js && pkg -o built/compress -t node18-macos-x64 compress.js
scripts.build-linux: pkg -o built/convertmp4 -t node18-linux-x64 convertmp4.js && pkg -o built/compress -t node18-linux-x64 compress.js
scripts.build: npm run build-win && npm run build-mac && npm run build-linux
